text: Yesli by oni rukovodstvovalis' Tauratom (Toroy), Indzhilom (Yevangeliyem) i tem, chto bylo nisposlano im ot ikh Gospoda, to oni pitalis' by tem, chto nad nimi, i tem, chto u nikh pod nogami. Sredi nikh yest' umerennyye lyudi (pravedniki, uverovavshiye v Proroka Mukhammada, izbegayushchiye chrezmernosti v religii i ne delayushchiye upushcheniy), no plokho to, chto sovershayut mnogiye iz nikh
